title: [LFM] Looking for Ranked 5's
body:
We need a jungler and support or mid. If you are top we might also consider you :3
We want to make a stable ranked team with active players. We want to win but at the same time have fun.
We don't want serious players who only look out for themselves and get mad when we lose some games or someone screws ups. We want to have fun together as a team and also get better together as we kill the enemy team ;3
We use skype/teamspeak most of the time. 
If you're interested hit me up :D

IGN:
Age:
Rank [season 4]:
Top 3 champs:
Strengths:
Weaknesses:
Additional comments:

replies.body:
IGN: The Thespian0
Age: 20
Rank [season 4]: Silver I
Top 3 Champs: Xerath, Orianna, Ziggs
Strengths: Very good laner early game, good roamer as a mid lane main, great map awareness, good at warding
Weakness: Gotta work on my positioning in team fights, still learning champion power spikes, farm can always be better
Additional Comments: Looking for a group I can really play with, get to know, and have some fun. I can adapt to any play style and am willing to learn as well as share my knowledge of the game. I would be a good presence on the team. LETS BEAT EM AND HAVE FUN DOING IT!

IGN: RepriseOfAngels
Age: 23
Rank [season 4]: Plat I (Plat V after placements)
Top 3 champs: Udyr, Nocturne, Kha'Zix
Strengths: Core counter-jungling mechanic, can keep up farm, gank and dual in jungle well. Mained Jungle since Season 2. But even with a main I am always learning and willing to learn. 
Weaknesses: For most of my games and this is clear, I try to force plays and go for baron when it really is not beneficial for the team.
Additional comments: N/A

IGN: ImTryingToLearn
Age: 18
Rank [season 4]: Gold 2
Top 3 champs: Ahri, Xerath, Leblanc
Strengths: Good lane mechanics, large champion pool, good communication.
Weaknesses: Very aggressive (can be good or bad)
Additional comments: Just add me to try me out :)
So are we supposed to add you or you going to be responding to post or what's going on with this?

**IGN**: Cosmic Seagull
**Age**: 17
**Rank [season 4]**: Silver 1
**Top 3 champs**: Depends on role; 
**Strengths**: I can play every role and tend to pickup champions pretty fast. Can take criticism and play often.
**Weaknesses**: Sometimes if I get too far behind, I can be slow to recover.
**Additional comments**: Just looking for a fun team to play with, who actually play the game and don't give up after like two days!

IGN: Pusmonstaa
Age: 23
Rank [season 4]: Silver V
Top 3 champs: Trundle, Udyr, Warwick
Strengths: Early ganks (if possible), Front lineman, passive, Map awareness, communication
Weaknesses: Warding (working on this very much)
Additional comments: I am looking for a good team. Currently, I am playing with Gold Players and a Plat player, but they are hardly on. So I am drifting off from the group.
what soloq range are you guys
